languages.text: "Указующий на ошибку да будет вознагражден за истину. Но если не хочешь ты видеть истину, оставайся в числе слепцов".
"The one who points out a mistake shall be rewarded for the truth. But if you do not wish to see the truth, remain among the blind."
languages.original_text: "Указующий на ошибку да будет вознагражден за истину. Но если не хочешь ты видеть истину, оставайся в числе слепцов".

traits.locale_text: "The one who points out a mistake shall be rewarded for the truth. But if you do not wish to see the truth, then stay among the blind."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The one who points out a mistake shall be rewarded for the truth. But if you do not wish to see the truth, remain among the blind."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “直言不讳的人应当为揭示真相而受到奖赏。如果你不想看到真相，可以继续与瞎子为伍。”
languages.original_text: "The one who points out a mistake shall be rewarded for the truth. But if you do not wish to see the truth, remain among the blind."

traits.locale_text: “直言不讳的人应当为揭示真相而受到奖赏。如果你不想看到真相，可以继续与瞎子为伍。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Aquel que señala un error debería ser recompensado por honrar la verdad. Pero si usted prefiere no ver la verdad, camine pues entre los ciegos».
languages.original_text: "The one who points out a mistake shall be rewarded for the truth. But if you do not wish to see the truth, remain among the blind."

traits.locale_text: «Aquel que señala un error debería ser recompensado por honrar la verdad. Pero si usted prefiere no ver la verdad, camine pues entre los ciegos».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Celui qui signale une erreur sera récompensé pour avoir dit la vérité. Mais si vous préférez fermer les yeux, alors restez parmi les aveugles. »
languages.original_text: "The one who points out a mistake shall be rewarded for the truth. But if you do not wish to see the truth, remain among the blind."

traits.locale_text: « Celui qui signale une erreur sera récompensé pour avoir dit la vérité. Mais si vous préférez fermer les yeux, alors restez parmi les aveugles. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Wer auf einen Fehler aufmerksam macht, sollte für die Wahrheit belohnt werden. Aber wenn Ihr die Wahrheit nicht sehen wollt, dann bleibt eben blind."
languages.original_text: "The one who points out a mistake shall be rewarded for the truth. But if you do not wish to see the truth, remain among the blind."

traits.locale_text: "Wer auf einen Fehler aufmerksam macht, sollte für die Wahrheit belohnt werden. Aber wenn Ihr die Wahrheit nicht sehen wollt, dann bleibt eben blind."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「間違いを指摘する者は、真実に対して報いを受ける。しかし、もし真実を見たくないのならば、盲目でいつづけるべし」
languages.original_text: "The one who points out a mistake shall be rewarded for the truth. But if you do not wish to see the truth, remain among the blind."

traits.locale_text: 「間違いを指摘する者は、真実に対して報いを受ける。しかし、もし真実を見たくないのならば、盲目でいつづけるべし」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Yanlışı gösteren, doğru için ödüllendirilmelidir. Gerçeği görmek istemiyorsan körlerin arasında kal."
languages.original_text: "The one who points out a mistake shall be rewarded for the truth. But if you do not wish to see the truth, remain among the blind."

traits.locale_text: "Yanlışı gösteren, doğru için ödüllendirilmelidir. Gerçeği görmek istemiyorsan körlerin arasında kal."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
